sources.title: Rollin' Plains
sources.description: Tex Ritter plays a Texas Ranger who comes to the aid of a group of cattlemen who've found themselves in the middle of a vicious land war with ruthless sheep farmers and of one landowner in particular who finds himself framed for murder by the sheep men and by his own half-brother.

sources.title: Rollin' Plains (1938)
sources.description: It's cattlemen versus sheepmen and Trigger Gargan appears to be the leader of the gang causing the trouble. But unknown to Ranger Tex Lawrence, the respected town citizen Barrow is the boss and is tipping off the gang as to the Ranger's activities. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/rollin-plains-1938/

sources.title: Rollin Plains (1938) TEX RITTER
sources.description:
Stars: Tex Ritter, Karl Hackett, White Flash 
Director: Albert Herman

It's cattlemen versus sheepmen and Trigger Gargan appears to be the leader of the gang causing the trouble. But unknown to Ranger Tex Lawrence, the respected town citizen Barrow is the boss and is tipping off the gang as to the Ranger's activities.

metadata.Plot: It's cattlemen versus sheepmen and Trigger Gargan appears to be the leader of the gang causing the trouble. But unknown to Ranger Tex Lawrence, the respected town citizen Barrow is the boss and is tipping off the gang as to the Ranger's activities.
metadata.Writer: Jacques Jaccard, Celia Jaccard, Lindsley Parsons
metadata.Actors: Tex Ritter, Karl Hackett, White Flash
